'''Polished blackstone bricks''' are a decorative version of [[polished blackstone]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
{{breaking row|Polished Blackstone Bricks|link=none|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Polished blackstone bricks generate as part of [[bastion remnant]]s and [[ruined portal]]s.

{{Block distribution}}
